availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Abraham R. Groves, Sr. (Jefferson County, Kentucky, physician, farmer, and justice of the peace)

body.p: Jefferson County, Kentucky, physician, farmer, and justice of the peace. Kentucky native. Son of Isaac Groves. Married to S. Jane Groves. Father of Mary E. Groves and Charles I. Groves. Graduated from the Kentucky School of Medicine and the University of Louisville. Physician and farmer in Jefferson County from c1856 to 1906. Justice of the peace in Jefferson County in 1865.

bibl.p: Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Hays Precinct, p. 3; "Dr. Abraham R Groves Dies at Home in East End," The Courier-Journal (Louisville, Ky.), April 18, 1911, p. 7.
